title: How many 19th century novels have you read? Which ones? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most of DickensMost of TwainMost of Alexandre DumasJames Fenimore Cooper’s Leatherstocking series5 by Jane Austen3 by Robert Louis Stevenson6 by Jules VerneSome TolstoySome Washington IrvingAll of the Sherlock HolmesMoby DickLes MiserablesCrime & PunishmentHeart of DarknessRed Badge of CourageJane EyreIvanhoeThe Time MachineAlice’s Adventures in WonderlandNanaThree Men in a BoatProbably others; difficult to remember them all.
More than I can count. See: Amazon.com: A Leatherstocking Companion, Novels and Narratives as History (Traditional American History Series Book 13) eBook: James M. Volo: Kindle Store
